result.execSummary:
On one or more charges, the deferred prosecution or sentencing agreement(s) on this case were fulfilled, and the charge(s) were dismissed.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superAgency.name: Washington County
superAgency.notes: Defendant shall comply with conditions of Deferred Prosecution Agreement.

records.addlTxt: Def, Michael D Gleesing not appearing.  Atty Mandy A. Schepper for State.  Clerk: CP. Def is in compliance.  State moves for dismissal; Court so orders.
Deferred prosecution agreement hearing at 12-19-2016 08:15 am

Def appeared in person.  Atty Stephanie L Hanson for State.  Clerk: CP.  Agreement reached. Def continues atty waiver; Court accepts waiver.  State moves to dismiss and read-in Ct 1; Court so orders.  On Ct 2 State recommends deferred prosecution agreement.  Statements from def.  Def enters guilty plea to Ct 2.  Court accepts plea, withholds finding of guilt and approves deferred prosecution agreement.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for December 19, 2016 at 08:15 am.
No contact with ACF, direct or indirect except incidental contact at school
Victim does not request to be present for hearings

Def appeared in person.  Atty Stephanie L Hanson for State.  Clerk: CP  Def given complaint, advised of charges, penalties and rights, and probable cause found. Pretrial held; DPA was offered - adj requested to finalize DPA.  Def continues atty waiver; Court accepts waiver.  Court sets $1000 signature bond.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 21, 2015 at 09:45 am.
